page.title: 14SECTION 7 - EAST SHORE
page.content: ECOLOGY - Foothpath along lakeside from Pooley Bridge to Waterside. RECREATION - Boating, sailing, windsurfing and fishing, reasonable supply of brown trout and perch. EMPLOYMENT - Farming & Tourism FARMING - Mainly sheep, some cattle, all the land is grass, some cropped for hay and silage for winter feed, the rest is used for grazing all the year round TOURISM - Caravan & Camping Sites at Parkfoot. Clubhouse with dance floor, licenced bar & meal facilities for users of caravan site only. Campsite at Waterside House. SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY - Underground Pumping Station which extracts water from Ullswater and delivers it to the North West Water Board's reservoir at Haweswater 7 miles away. Slipway for repair & painting of passenger boats.
